page.title: 18CLUB ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are quite a few clubs in Rookhope; one of them is a Youth Club where children go to play pool, snooker, darts and table tennis....... you can also buy sweets and listen to records. Another club is the Working Men's Club and there is a Badminton Club as well. The Workmen's Club is for the grown-ups to go to at night but the children can go if they want any crisps or appletise. The Badminton Club is where children play badminton; you get a drink of orange for five pence. It is good because you learn how to play.
